column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////FOOD: Not usually the biggest fan of tapas because I leave hungry
column2: but their portions are huge! For veggies
column3: I liked the spinach & manchengo-stuffed mushrooms. For seafood
column6: and bay scallops empanada. If you really want to be stuffed
column7: get the paella; they claim one order serves two
column8: but the serving size is way bigger. I liked the seafood paella because the bay scallops are so soft and tender; however
